name: Photo Collage - Collageable
description:
Create amazing movies with the best all-in-one video editor - FLMX! Easiest and fast way to capture life’s favorite moments, produce your own-style videos and turn them into a stunning cinematic masterpiece on-the-go!

All you need to change your footage into a great little video and become your own master filmmaker! Enhance your clips with cool one-touch filters, apply creative effects & unique looks for your films, add the right music for every mood & moment, and edit instantly! Cut, trim, split, mix & fit for Insta, Vine, Facebook, Coub! Enjoy & share your cinematic creations with your friends and the world!

***Premium Subscription***

As a member of FLMX Premium, you enjoy unlimited access to all Pro features!

-4 subscription options: weekly ($3.99 USD, 3-days free trial), weekly ‘special’ ($3.99 USD), monthly ($6.99 USD), annual (12-months, $9.99 USD per month, full pre-payment).
-By subscribing you get unlimited access to all the app’s functionality for the whole duration of your subscription period.
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
-Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. “Free trial” > $3.99/week, or renewal equals to the initial subscription chosen and its current price unless a special price is offered.
-You can cancel a free trial, manage your subscription and turn off the auto-renewal anytime through your Account Settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged.
-Privacy Policy: http://myappsexpert.com/privacy-policy/
-Terms of Use: http://myappsexpert.com/tc/
-As soon as you purchase a subscription, any unused part or time-span of a free trial period will be forfeited.

We’d love to hear from YOU! Drop us a line at support@myappsexpert.com

~ FLMX Team
